Articles.Content:
I wonder if there is any way I can read/write the public KSP Field properties from external Mod Modules. that way, I can act on them/modify their behaviour

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-10T09:45:35Z" title="06/10/2015 09:45  AM" data-short="9 yr">June 10, 2015</time> by FreeThinker**

Edit: I Guess I have to use reflection something like

    [COLOR=blue]var[/COLOR] objectType = obj.GetType(); [COLOR=blue]var[/COLOR] field = objectType.GetField(name, [COLOR=#2b91af]BindingFlags[/COLOR].Instance | [COLOR=#2b91af]BindingFlags[/COLOR].Public | [COLOR=#2b91af]BindingFlags[/COLOR].NonPublic );field.SetValue(1); 

Would this work?

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-10T10:16:58Z" title="06/10/2015 10:16  AM" data-short="9 yr">June 10, 2015</time> by FreeThinker**

For values that have the KSPField tag, they show in the PartModules.Fields list.

You can then reference them as a BaseField object (from memory, check that object name) for interacting with them.

D.
